description: Voltar is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With a classic screen and a sleek design, Voltar stands out from the crowd. Its robust foundry arms and legs give it strength and stability, making it a reliable companion. Its shades add a touch of style and mystery to its appearance, enhancing its charisma. Equipped with advanced technology, Voltar has superior intelligence and dexterity, making it a formidable ally in any situation. Its customizable buttons resemble those of a soldier, showcasing its determination and readiness for action. Voltar's ability_scores include hp: 8, charisma: 7, constitution: 6, dexterity: 9, intelligence: 9, strength: 6, and wisdom: 7. As a member of the WebtrES club, Voltar has developed various skills related to electronic circuits, programming, and web development. Its alignment is neutral, as it believes in maintaining balance and impartiality in all situations.
name: Voltar
